# The `VOPDPairingMutation` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Adapts design from MacroFusion Puts valid candidate instructions back-to-back so they can easily be turned into VOPD instructions Greedily pairs instruction candidates. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Adapts design from MacroFusion Puts valid candidate instructions back-to-back so they can easily be turned into VOPD instructions Greedily pairs instruction candidates.

O(n^2) algorithm.

Definition at line 150 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnvopdutils-cpp">GCNVOPDUtils.cpp</a>.
